uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.stream

Interface StreamData

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MimeStreamData
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStreamData, BlobStreamData, ByteArrayMimeStreamData, ByteArrayStreamData, FileItemStreamData, FileStreamData, MimeStreamDataWrapper, PartStreamData

    public interface StreamData
    Interface implemented by Objects that can provide their data as a Stream
    Author:
    spb
